channel.title: Pharmer CLI on Run production-grade databases easily on Kubernetes
channel.description: Recent content in Pharmer CLI on Run production-grade databases easily on Kubernetes

item.title: Data Store
item.description: Pharmer supports following storage provider Vfs Postgres Database

item.title: Postgres Database XORM
item.description: Postgres Database (xorm) Stores data in PostgresSQL using xorm Introduction $ pharmer config -h Pharmer configuration Usage: pharmer config [flags] pharmer config [command] Examples: pharmer config view Available Commands: get-contexts List available contexts set-context Create config object view Print Pharmer config Flags: -h, --help help for config Global Flags: --alsologtostderr log to standard error as well as files --analytics Send analytical events to Google Guard (default true) --config-file string Path to Pharmer config file --env string Environment used to enable debugging (default "prod") --log_backtrace_at traceLocation when logging hits line file:N, emit a stack trace (default :0) --log_dir string If non-empty, write log files in this directory --logtostderr log to standard error instead of files (default true) --stderrthreshold severity logs at or above this threshold go to stderr (default 2) -v, --v Level log level for V logs --vmodule moduleSpec comma-separated list of pattern=N settings for file-filtered logging Use "pharmer config [command] --help" for more information about a command.

item.title: Virtual File System
item.description: Virtual file system (Vfs) Stores data on File (local/remote) using stow Introduction $ pharmer config -h Pharmer configuration Usage: pharmer config [flags] pharmer config [command] Examples: pharmer config view Available Commands: get-contexts List available contexts set-context Create config object view Print Pharmer config Flags: -h, --help help for config Global Flags: --alsologtostderr log to standard error as well as files --analytics Send analytical events to Google Guard (default true) --config-file string Path to Pharmer config file --env string Environment used to enable debugging (default "prod") --log_backtrace_at traceLocation when logging hits line file:N, emit a stack trace (default :0) --log_dir string If non-empty, write log files in this directory --logtostderr log to standard error instead of files (default true) --stderrthreshold severity logs at or above this threshold go to stderr (default 2) -v, --v Level log level for V logs --vmodule moduleSpec comma-separated list of pattern=N settings for file-filtered logging Use "pharmer config [command] --help" for more information about a command.
